Description: The following statement contains a magic number: using (var system = ActorSystem.Create("system"))              using (var materializer = system.Materializer())              {                  var flow = Source                      .From(new[] {1' 2' 3})                      .Select(x => x + 1);                    var result = flow                      .RunForeach(x =>                      {                          Console.WriteLine(x);                      }' materializer);                    result.Wait();              }
